amendment.description: Amendment allows use of funds in the bill for operation of charter schools.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow use of funds in the bill to operate charter schools.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Gosar.
